text: The Donetsk People's Republic (DNR) and the Luhansk People's Republic (LNR) are two unrecognized proto-states located in the Donbass region of eastern Ukraine. Internationally, they are recognized as constituent regions of Ukraine as the Donetsk and Luhansk oblasts, respectively.UN General Assembly adopts resolution affirming Ukraine's territorial integrity, Xinhua 28 March 2014. They proclaimed their independence after the 2014 Ukrainian revolution and the subsequent Russian military intervention, later on merging together as the unrecognized state of Novorossiya, only to be dissolved in 2015. Today, they are only officially recognized by South Ossetia. Both entities have no embassies in any other state. ==DNR Representation Bureaus== * – in 2016, DNR sympathizers opened a self-proclaimed "Consulate" in OstravaDonetsk Separatists Fly Flag At Czech Center That Prague Vows To Close, RFE/RL 2. September 2016.Donetsk Separatists Open 'Consulate' in the Czech Republic, Moscow Times 2. September 2016. * – in 2017, a DNR Representative Office opened in MarseilleVladislav Berdichevsky: DPR Representative Centre in France will help Europeans learn truth about civil war in Donbass, DNR Soviet 26. September 2017. * – the DNR has two Representative Offices in Italy ** in 2016, the first opened in Turin ** in 2019, the second opened in VeronaSecond mission of self-proclaimed Donetsk People’s Republic opens in Italy, TASS 9. February 2019.Dario Cristiani: Italy-Ukraine Relations: Signs of Improvement, but No Breakthrough, Jamestown Foundation 26. February 2020. * – in 2014, the DNR opened a Representative Office in MoscowДНР открыла представительство в Москве (The DNR opened a Representative Office in Moscow), Московский Комсомолец 28. May 2014. ** – in 2016, DNR sympathizers opened a Representative Office in SimferopolPublic Movement 'Donetsk Republic' opens representative office in Crimea, Sputnik 8. July 2016. * – in 2015, a DNR Representative Office opened in TskhinvalDPR and LPR opens representative office in South Ossetia, TASS 28. April 2015. ==LNR Representation Bureaus== * – in 2019, the LNR opened a Cultural Representation Office in Kolwezi (Lualaba Province)Павел Ханарин: Культурный центр ЛНР откроется в Демократической Республике Конго (Pavel Khanarin: Culture Centre of the LNR opens in the Democratic Republic of Congo), donetsk.kp.ru 19. February 2019.Sergey Sukhankin: Russia Looks for Inroads Into Central Africa (Part One), Jamestown Foundation 23. April 2020. * – in 2019, the LNR opened a Representative Offices in MessinaSilvia Vittoria Missotti: A Messina apre il Centro di Rappresentanza della Repubblica Popolare di Lugansk, il primo in UE (A Representative Center of the Lugansk People's Republic opens in Messina, the first in the EU), opinione-pubblica.com 11. July 2018. * – a Representative Office is located in Moscow :* in 2014, another Representative Office opened in St. PetersburgОфициальное представительство ЛНР открылось в Петербурге, nakanune.ru 22. July 2014. :* in 2019, a Migration Office opened in Novoshakhtinsk (Rostov Oblast)В Ростовской области открыли первый центр выдачи российских паспортов жителям ЛНР, Novaya Gazeta 29. April 2019. * – in 2015, a LNR Representative Office opened in TskhinvalDPR and LPR opens representative office in South Ossetia, TASS 28. April 2015. ==See also== * International recognition of Donetsk and Luhansk ==References== Category:Donetsk People's Republic Category:Luhansk People's Republic Category:Lists of diplomatic missions by sending country
title: International representation of Donetsk and Luhansk
